list.sql:
SELECT 'A001' FROM PROD
SELECT 1 FROM PROD
SELECT 'keyValue' FROM PROD
SELECT *, ${} AS key_value FROM PROD WHERE list_id = #{listId} LIMIT 0, #{rowNum:int}
SELECT * FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY ${orderKey} !

SELECT * FROM tb_dp_dataset_frame A WHERE tenant_id = 'S02'
AND dataset_id < A.test
AND dataset_id > 1.2
AND dataset_id < 2.1
AND dataset_id > 2.2
ORDER BY title
SELECT * FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE rownum <= 10 AND list_id_merong <ABCDE 10

SELECT * FROM TABLE_SAMPLE WHERE 1=1
SELECT #{index} AS index, #{names} AS name FROM DUAL
ORDER BY title

SELECT * FROM TABLE_SAMPLE WHERE 1=1
SELECT #{index} AS index, #{names} AS name FROM DUAL
ORDER BY title

SELECT * FROM TABLE_SAMPLE WHERE 1=1
AND name = #{name}
AND name = 'DANTE'
<if test="10 <= #{age} && #{age} <= 20"> AND age = 'TEENAGE'
<elseif test="40 <= #{age} && #{age} <= 50"> AND age = 'RATHER OLD'
AND age = 'DEFAULT'
AND key = '3'
AND key = '4'
AND key = '5'
AND key = 'DEFAULT'
AND val = '3'
AND val = '4'
AND val = '5'
AND val = 'DEFAULT'
